txt.en: 'The passage of the terrible riders across Ruddymore has done something to the animals that live here. Beasts that once lived peacefully alongside farms and villages are now driven to madness, attacking folk they never had before. If you wish to help us keep these lands safe, you will help us deal with these creatures that have been newly driven to madness.'
Thornegil believes the passage of the terrible Riders has stirred the creatures of Ruddymore to madness.
Defeat creatures in Ruddymore that pose a danger to folk nearby ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Thank you for helping keep these lands safe, [placeholder]. Never before in my memory have we had to deal with such evil as these riders in black possess.'
Talk to Thornegil at Sarn Ford
Defeated creatures in Ruddymore that pose a danger ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The creatures that live in Ruddymore act with a madness they never have before, and must be dealt with before they do harm to the folk who live nearby.

'The passage of the terrible riders across Ruddymore has done something to the animals that live here. Beasts that once lived peacefully alongside farms and villages are now driven to madness, attacking folk they never had before. If you wish to help us keep these lands safe, you will help us deal with these creatures that have been newly driven to madness.'
